ValidationRule.description: Certain fields should not contain special characters otherwise they can not be properly vetted and cleaned by Data.com Clean
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Alias <> "autocln", $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, NOT(ISPICKVAL(CleanStatus, "In Sync")), NOT(CONTAINS(BillingStreet, "C/o")), NOT(CONTAINS(BillingStreet, "C/O")), NOT(CONTAINS(BillingStreet, "c/o")), OR( CONTAINS(Name, '\\'), CONTAINS(Name, ';'), CONTAINS(Name, '|'), CONTAINS(Name, ':'), CONTAINS(Phone, '/'), CONTAINS(Phone, '\\'), CONTAINS(Phone, ';'), CONTAINS(Phone, '|'), CONTAINS(Phone, ':'), CONTAINS(BillingCity, '/'), CONTAINS(BillingCity, '\\'), CONTAINS(BillingCity, ';'), CONTAINS(BillingCity, '|'), CONTAINS(BillingCity, ':'), CONTAINS(BillingStreet, '\\'), CONTAINS(BillingStreet, ';'), CONTAINS(BillingStreet, '|') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Account Name, Phone, Street Address, and City cannot contain the following special characters: / | \ ; :
